Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class Tracker

Base class for class wrappers that notify when specific instances of the wrapped class change internal state.

SetGlobalHandler(Action<Object, Object>)

Sets the handler to be called when no instance specific handler is registered. The action arguments are the instance followed by the arguments.
Declaration
public void SetGlobalHandler(Action<object, object> action)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Action<System.Object, System.Object> action
| Improve this Doc View Source

SetHandler(Object, Action<Object>)

Sets the handler to be called when a specific instance of the Tracker requested a change. Multiple instance specific handlers are not supported. The argument passed to the action are the arguments, not the instance!
Declaration
public void SetHandler([NotNull] object instance, [NotNull] Action<object> action)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Object instance
System.Action<System.Object> action
